SELECT t.*, u.name as userName, IFNULL(( SELECT sum( tt.return_sum ) FROM cloud_task tt WHERE tt.account_id = t.id ), 0) as returnSum, IFNULL(( SELECT sum( tt.resources_sum ) FROM cloud_task tt WHERE tt.account_id = t.id ), 0) as resourcesSum, IFNULL(( SELECT count( tc.id ) FROM cloud_task tc WHERE tc.account_id = t.id and tc.status in ('FINISHED', 'ERROR', 'WARNING') ), 0) as overRules, IFNULL(( SELECT count( tt.id ) FROM cloud_task tt WHERE tt.account_id = t.id ), 0) as allRules, IFNULL((select t1.scan_score FROM history_scan t1 WHERE t.id = t1.account_id ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC limit 1), 100) AS scanScore, CASE WHEN 'APPROVED' IN (SELECT t2.status FROM cloud_task t2 WHERE t.id = t2.account_id) THEN 'APPROVED' WHEN 'PROCESSING' IN (SELECT t2.status FROM cloud_task t2 WHERE t.id = t2.account_id) THEN 'PROCESSING' WHEN 'ERROR' IN (SELECT t2.status FROM cloud_task t2 WHERE t.id = t2.account_id) THEN 'ERROR' WHEN 'WARNING' IN (SELECT t2.status FROM cloud_task t2 WHERE t.id = t2.account_id) THEN 'WARNING' WHEN 'FINISHED' IN (SELECT t2.status FROM cloud_task t2 WHERE t.id = t2.account_id) THEN 'FINISHED' ELSE 'UNDEFINED' END AS resultStatus FROM cloud_account t LEFT JOIN user u on t.creator = u.id LEFT JOIN plugin p on t.plugin_id = p.id
AND t.id = #{accountId}
and p.type = 'cloud'
ORDER BY t.create_time DESC

SELECT t.*, u.name as userName, IFNULL(( SELECT sum( tt.return_sum ) FROM cloud_task tt WHERE tt.account_id = t.id ), 0) as returnSum, IFNULL(( SELECT sum( tt.resources_sum ) FROM cloud_task tt WHERE tt.account_id = t.id ), 0) as resourcesSum, IFNULL(( SELECT count( tc.id ) FROM cloud_task tc WHERE tc.account_id = t.id and tc.status in ('FINISHED', 'ERROR', 'WARNING') ), 0) as overRules, IFNULL(( SELECT count( tt.id ) FROM cloud_task tt WHERE tt.account_id = t.id ), 0) as allRules, IFNULL((select t1.scan_score FROM history_scan t1 WHERE t.id = t1.account_id ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC limit 1), 100) AS scanScore, CASE WHEN 'APPROVED' IN (SELECT t2.status FROM cloud_task t2 WHERE t.id = t2.account_id) THEN 'APPROVED' WHEN 'PROCESSING' IN (SELECT t2.status FROM cloud_task t2 WHERE t.id = t2.account_id) THEN 'PROCESSING' WHEN 'ERROR' IN (SELECT t2.status FROM cloud_task t2 WHERE t.id = t2.account_id) THEN 'ERROR' WHEN 'WARNING' IN (SELECT t2.status FROM cloud_task t2 WHERE t.id = t2.account_id) THEN 'WARNING' WHEN 'FINISHED' IN (SELECT t2.status FROM cloud_task t2 WHERE t.id = t2.account_id) THEN 'FINISHED' ELSE 'UNDEFINED' END AS resultStatus FROM cloud_account t LEFT JOIN user u on t.creator = u.id LEFT JOIN plugin p on t.plugin_id = p.id
AND t.id = #{accountId}
and p.type = 'vuln'
ORDER BY t.create_time DESC

SELECT t.*, CASE WHEN ( SELECT count(t5.id) FROM rule_inspection_report_mapping t1 JOIN rule t2 ON t1.rule_id = t2.id JOIN resource_rule t3 ON t2.id = t3.rule_id JOIN resource t4 ON t4.id = t3.resource_id JOIN resource_item t5 ON t4.id = t5.resource_id WHERE t1.report_id = t.id AND t4.account_id = #{accountId} AND t1.rule_id IN (SELECT rule_id FROM rule_group_mapping WHERE group_id = #{groupId}) ) > 0 THEN 'risky' ELSE 'risk_free' END AS status FROM rule_inspection_report t
AND t.project like CONCAT('%',#{project},'%')
AND t.item_sort_first_level = #{itemSortFirstLevel}
AND t.item_sort_second_level = #{itemSortSecondLevel}
AND LOWER(t.project) like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND ( SELECT count(t.id) FROM rule_inspection_report_mapping t1 JOIN rule t2 ON t1.rule_id = t2.id WHERE t1.report_id = t.id AND t1.rule_id IN (SELECT rule_id FROM rule_group_mapping WHERE group_id = #{groupId}) ) > 0
ORDER BY FIELD(status, 'risky','risk_free'), t.id

SELECT DISTINCT t.* FROM cloud_task t JOIN cloud_task_item t1 on t.id = t1.task_id JOIN rule_inspection_report_mapping t2 on t2.rule_id = t1.rule_id JOIN rule_inspection_report t3 on t3.id = t2.report_id where t3.id = #{id}

SELECT ( SELECT count( DISTINCT t.id ) FROM rule_inspection_report t LEFT JOIN rule_inspection_report_mapping t1 ON t1.report_id = t.id LEFT JOIN cloud_task_item t2 ON t2.rule_id = t1.rule_id LEFT JOIN cloud_task t3 ON t3.id = t2.task_id LEFT JOIN rule_group_mapping t4 ON t3.rule_id = t4.rule_id WHERE t3.account_id = #{accountId} AND t3.return_sum > 0 AND t3.rule_id IN (SELECT rule_id FROM rule_group_mapping WHERE group_id = #{groupId}) ) AS riskyRegulation,
( SELECT count( DISTINCT t.id ) FROM rule_inspection_report t ) AS totalRegulation,
( SELECT sum( t.return_sum ) FROM cloud_task t WHERE t.account_id = #{accountId} AND t.rule_id IN (SELECT rule_id FROM rule_group_mapping WHERE group_id = #{groupId}) ) AS returnSum,
( SELECT sum( t.resources_sum ) FROM cloud_task t WHERE t.account_id = #{accountId} AND t.rule_id IN (SELECT rule_id FROM rule_group_mapping WHERE group_id = #{groupId}) ) AS resourcesSum

SELECT t.id, t.name, t.description, t.level, t.plugin_id as pluginId, t.flag, CASE WHEN ( SELECT count(t5.id) FROM rule_group_mapping t1 JOIN rule t2 ON t1.rule_id = t2.id JOIN resource_rule t3 ON t2.id = t3.rule_id JOIN resource t4 ON t4.id = t3.resource_id JOIN resource_item t5 ON t4.id = t5.resource_id WHERE t1.group_id = t.id AND t4.account_id = #{accountId} ) > 0 THEN 'risky' ELSE 'risk_free' END AS status, (select create_time from cloud_task where account_id = #{accountId} order by create_time desc limit 1) as createTime, '暂无合规报告' as state FROM rule_group t left join cloud_account t1 on t.plugin_id = t1.plugin_id WHERE t1.id = #{accountId} AND t.id IN (SELECT group_id FROM rule_group_mapping)

SELECT DISTINCT t.hummer_id as hummerId, t.region_id as regionId, t.region_name as regionName, t1.resource_name as resourceName, t.resource_type as resourceType, t.severity, t3.name as ruleName, t3.description as ruleDescription, IFNULL(t5.project, '暂无') as project, IFNULL(t5.item_sort_first_level, '暂无') as firstLevel, IFNULL(t5.item_sort_second_level, '暂无') as secondLevel, IFNULL(t5.improvement, '暂无') as improvement FROM resource_item t JOIN resource t1 on t.resource_id = t1.id JOIN resource_rule t2 on t.resource_id = t2.resource_id JOIN rule t3 on t2.rule_id = t3.id JOIN rule_group_mapping g on t3.id = g.rule_id and g.group_id = #{groupId} LEFT JOIN rule_inspection_report_mapping t4 on t3.id = t4.rule_id LEFT JOIN rule_inspection_report t5 on t4.report_id = t5.id WHERE t.account_id = #{accountId} ORDER BY t.resource_type, t1.resource_name, t.region_id, t.hummer_id
SELECT t.* FROM rule_inspection_report t JOIN rule_inspection_report_mapping t1 ON t.id = t1.report_id WHERE t1.rule_id = #{ruleId} ORDER BY id
